name: XLaunchpad
description: XLaunchpad gives you instant access to all your shortcuts.Arrange apps in XLaunchpad any way you like by dragging icons to different locations or by grouping apps in folders. Simply drag one icon over another to create a folder. you can name the folder whatever you like when you open the folder.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Memory: 128 MB RAM Storage: 128 MB available space
